ti:edition.ti:label: De Abrahamo
ti:edition.ti:description: Philo Judaeus. Cohn, Leonard, editor. Opera quae supersunt, Volume 4. Berlin: Reimer, 1902.

ti:translation.ti:label: On the Life of the Wise Man made perfect by Instruction; or, on the Unwritten Law, that is to say, on Abraham
ti:translation.ti:description: The works of Philo Judaeus, the contemporary of Josephus, volume 2. Yonge, C. D., translator. London: Henry G. Bohn, 1854.
